If you know me, (which you donâ€™t) if there is a free app, I WILL GET IT! So I downloaded it and it has already helped me cope with guilt from when I was younger, stress/anxiety, bad mindsets and even mental blocks. Truly this app has helped me cope with myself and it helped show me that not everyone can be perfect or be the person they want to be, if youâ€™re being yourself, thatâ€™s good enough. This app has changed me in the best way possible and if your reading this because your considering getting this app, I urge you to try it out. If you donâ€™t love it, you donâ€™t have to use it. If you love it (which you will) you should totally keep it. I hope this review was informational and I hope it convinced you to get this app. Hope you all have a positive, safe and beautiful day.', 'author': 679134, 'version': '6.0.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-11', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Trail subscription', 'content': 'I had signed up for a trial period with the understanding that I would be notified before the trial ended.
